::WindRider::
He ran through the hatch and stopped beside Battera,
attempting to catch his breath. He looked out across
the African landscape. "By the Matrix", he thought,
"this planet is beautiful!" But then a sobering
thought came to him. "And all it will take to destroy
it is a few stupid war-mongering bots."
